rules_text:
This land enters tapped.
{T}: Add {R} or {G}.
{RG}{RG}, Tap two untapped Deserts you control: This land becomes a 5/3 Sand Juggernaut creature until your next end step. It's still a land.
Whenever Rust-Marked Knoll attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each other creature you control with power 4 or greater.
